page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF (CONT.)
page.content: {What did you do then?} We had a cup of coffee,then Mr.Oliver and I went out on our appointments. {Where did you go and why? The calls were on insurance matters. We went to a poultry farm,an agricultural contractor's,had a quick bar lunch at the 'Middle Bell' Barton under Needwood,then to survey a church that was being demolished and finally to a haulage firm,arriving back at my office at 16.30. While we were at the haulage firm,the competitors in the Sealink Cycle Race went past. {Did you do anything in the office? Mr.Oliver went home to Nottingham,I quickly signed my post and went home to change for another engagement. {What was this other engagement?
